blogPost.excerpt: Filma is here to simplify the complex, giving all users; from experienced editors to first-time hobbyists, the ability to create powerful video compositions in a fast and effective manner. ⠀ Advanced features include Masking, Keyframing or Motion Tracking.
blogPost.body: Filma is here to simplify the complex, giving all users; from experienced editors to first-time hobbyists, the ability to create powerful video compositions in a fast and effective manner. ⠀ Advanced features include Masking, Keyframing or Motion Tracking.
blogPost.title: Filma - High-end video editing on the go for iPhone, iPad and Mac
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: Filma在这里简化了复杂的功能，为所有用户提供了从经验丰富的编辑到第一次业余爱好者的能力，能够以快速有效的方式创建强大的视频合成。⠀高级功能包括遮罩、关键帧设置或运动跟踪。
localize.tagline: 针对iPhone、iPad和Mac的高端视频随时随地编辑

localize.description: Filma在這裏簡化了複雜的功能，爲所有用戶提供了從經驗豐富的編輯到第一次業餘愛好者的能力，能夠以快速有效的方式創建強大的視頻合成。⠀高級功能包括遮罩、關鍵幀設置或運動跟蹤。
localize.tagline: 針對iPhone、iPad和Mac的高端視頻隨時隨地編輯

previous.excerpt: Scheduling meetings is often a tradeoff between ensuring the meeting happens and protecting your focus time. Motion gives you the best of both worlds, finding the best times for internal and external meetings while increasing the chances the meeting happens.
previous.title: Motion Scheduler - Reclaim an hour of deep work for every meeting scheduled

localize.description: 安排会议通常是在确保会议召开和保护您的焦点时间之间进行权衡。Motion让你两全其美，找到内部和外部会议的最佳时间，同时增加会议发生的机会。
localize.tagline: 为安排好的每个会议收回一小时的深入工作时间

localize.description: 安排會議通常是在確保會議召開和保護您的焦點時間之間進行權衡。Motion讓你兩全其美，找到內部和外部會議的最佳時間，同時增加會議發生的機會。
localize.tagline: 爲安排好的每個會議收回一小時的深入工作時間

next.excerpt: Mornin shows you where you are spending your time so that you can make the most of it. It is a chrome extension that works with Google Calendar.
next.title: Mornin - Smart categorization for your calendar events

localize.description: 晨间告诉你你在哪里度过你的时间，这样你就可以最大限度地利用时间。它是一个Chrome扩展，可以与Google Calendar一起使用。
localize.tagline: 对您的日历事件进行智能分类

localize.description: 晨間告訴你你在哪裏度過你的時間，這樣你就可以最大限度地利用時間。它是一個Chrome擴展，可以與Google Calendar一起使用。
localize.tagline: 對您的日曆事件進行智能分類
